detectors.description:
AuricRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewarder.sol#861-879) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewarder.sol#870)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewarder.sol#873)
detectors.markdown:
[AuricRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewarder.sol#L861-L879) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewarder.sol#L870)
	-[leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewarder.sol#L873)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in AuricRewards.exit() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewarder.sol#844-847):
	External calls:
	- withdraw(balanceOf(msg.sender)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewarder.sol#845)
		- uni.safeTransfer(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewarder.sol#641)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewarder.sol#568)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewarder.sol#846)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewarder.sol#568)
		- snx.safeApprove(escrow,0) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewarder.sol#854)
		- snx.safeApprove(escrow,reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewarder.sol#855)
		- PoolEscrow(escrow).release(msg.sender,reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewarder.sol#856)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewarder.sol#846)
		- lastUpdateTime = lastTimeRewardApplicable() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewarder.sol#783)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewarder.sol#846)
		- rewardPerTokenStored = rewardPerToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewarder.sol#782)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewarder.sol#846)
		- rewards[msg.sender] = 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewarder.sol#852)
		- rewards[account] = earned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewarder.sol#785)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewarder.sol#846)
		- userRewardPerTokenPaid[account] = rewardPerTokenStored (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewarder.sol#786)
